original_text: Say to him, “You should not be here in the palace. You have cut a grave in the rock here for yourself, but you do not have the authority to do that! You have made a beautiful grave high up on the hill, as if you belong with the kings. 22: Say to him, “You should not be here in the palace. You have cut a grave in the rock here for yourself, but you do not have the authority to do that! You have made a beautiful grave high up on the hill, as if you belong with the kings.
korean_text: 네가 여기와 무슨 관계가 있느냐 여기에 누가 있기에 여기서 너를 위하여 묘실을 팠느냐 높은 곳에 자기를 위하여 묘실을 팠고 반석에 자기를 위하여 처소를 쪼아내었도다

sentences.original_text: You should not be here in the palace
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이 궁에 있어서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: You have cut a grave in the rock here for yourself
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 자신을 위해 여기 바위에 무덤을 파 놓았다

sentences.original_text: but you do not have the authority to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 그렇게 할 권한이 없다

sentences.original_text: You have made a beautiful grave high up on the hill
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 언덕 위 높은 곳에 아름다운 무덤을 만들었다

sentences.original_text: as if you belong with the kings
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 네가 왕들과 함께 속한 것처럼
